channel.title: La Resistance - The Battle Starts Here!
channel.description:
[SIZE=4][CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/4szf5e.png[/img][/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE] [center]La Resistance was a server that has been brough back from the dead. It was originally owned by Jamian who is a popular RSPS youtuber and goes by the name Apehist. I have teamed up with him to remake this server to the fullest of its ability! Come join now while you can and get ahead in Beta. We currently have a 5 Man advertisement team so come release date you will start off just like the rest of our players.[/center]
[center][size=14pt]Links[/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.lr-rsps.com]The Battle Starts Here[/url][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Updates[/size][/center] [SPOILER=Updates]-Dwarf Multi Cannon -Single and Duo Slayer task -Boss Slayer Tasks -Gloabal server Announcements -Working Trivia bot -8 Minigames -11 Boss's -5 Floors of Dungeoneering -Team Dungeoneering -Working Construction -Teleporting Interfaces -Armadyl Staff and Runes -Crafting Armadyl Runes -100% Money Pouching storing up to 25B -Working Quick Prayers -100% Summoning -Processed Quest tab updating -100% Working Galkon Clan Chat -FIxed, Resizable, and Fullscreen client -Dicing and Mithril Seeds -New Pest Control System added -Castle Wars system -Clan wars in the making -FFA Minigame -4 Quests -FULLY working bank tabs and bank system[/SPOILER]
[center][size=14pt]Media[/size][/center] [center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ilAwepzRSwI[/youtube] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOt8k/fffefd2f99.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOtcA/813cd54343.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOtiw/624b15b7ba.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOtoe/8c8d974626.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOtsy/ecd7714fd1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOtvv/b34baefbe6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOtD2/a2a9a5461b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOu4k/171b36394f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOuc2/2cd83024f8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aIL1u/28c726ae83.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOuFt/5bedf1a08d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/aOuKa/1e3d7de9ba.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Links[/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.lr-rsps.com]The Battle Starts Here[/url][/center]

item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[SIZE=4][CENTER][/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[center]La Resistance was a server that has been brough back from the dead. It was originally owned by Jamian who is a popular RSPS youtuber and goes by the name Apehist. I have teamed up with him to remake this server to the fullest of its ability! Come join now while you can and get ahead in Beta. We currently have a 5 Man advertisement team so come release date you will start off just like the rest of our players.[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Links[/size][/center]
[center]The Battle Starts Here[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Updates[/size][/center]
[SPOILER=Updates]-Dwarf Multi Cannon
-Single and Duo Slayer task
-Boss Slayer Tasks
-Gloabal server Announcements
-Working Trivia bot
-8 Minigames
-11 Boss’s
-5 Floors of Dungeoneering
-Team Dungeoneering
-Working Construction
-Teleporting Interfaces
-Armadyl Staff and Runes
-Crafting Armadyl Runes
-100% Money Pouching storing up to 25B
-Working Quick Prayers
-100% Summoning
-Processed Quest tab updating
-100% Working Galkon Clan Chat
-FIxed, Resizable, and Fullscreen client
-Dicing and Mithril Seeds
-New Pest Control System added
-Castle Wars system
-Clan wars in the making
-FFA Minigame
-4 Quests
